text: Nɨbi pen God takaw ne ak kelɨgɨl, nap nased takaw nɨbi ke anep nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨpɨm agak. Nɨbi anɨgɨl apɨm, Bɨ olap nonɨm nap tap kɨlop ñɨbɨkop tek ak, kɨlop pen agup, Tap anɨb ak God nop ñin agɨl aglɨpin agup, bɨ anɨb ak ne nonɨm nap tap ma gɨñonɨmuŋ apɨm agak. Takaw anɨb apɨm ak, takaw tɨmel gup apɨm agak.
